ygData.subject: Re: Question?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen them offered for 25 plat on occasion.  Can t remember the stats off hand, but I know I want them!  Increases mana, and I think something else, as
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen them offered for 25 plat on occasion. Can't remember the stats
off hand, but I know I want them! Increases mana, and I think something
else, as well.

Calyn Dawnwatcher

>Hello all,
>
>Quick question for ya all.
>
>I was in Unrest and someone was selling some blood-stained gloves for 40
>plat. He said they were great for mages but before I could get the stats on
>the gloves my wonderous ISP gave me a swift to the arse and when I returned
>the fellow was gone. Anyone out there able to tell me what the stats on the
>gloves are? And are they worth the 40 plat? Seems pretty high for some
>golves.
>
>Thanks for you time,
>
>Mirrin of Nife
>
>
